title: Community Helpers
description: Community Helpers is an informational book that presents photographs of a diverse group of people in various occupations. The book helps students understand that many kinds of workers and jobs are important to a community.
reviewWords: baker, community, construction worker, doctor, firefighter, important, police officer, service dog, teacher
